short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin for jira, it enables copy paste buttons and fixes OTD.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin made in javascript language. It contains copy paste options for email labels which will allow user to create Email name and Email description without manually writing it. This all works only on jira page with atlassian account.
